thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: HorsesandHounds

author: HorsesandHounds
title: HorsesandHounds
text: I've shopped at Thrift Books for a couple of years now. The books are always as described, which gives ME the choice of book condition and price. If a book I need isn't currently available, I add it to my Wish List and am notified when a copy is in stock. I've found some real treasures here, and I feel great about getting used books back into circulation. I will continue to "browse" and shop at Thrift Books.
